Title: Russian tycoon Konstantin Malofeyev warns that Putin will reject ...
Description: Russian tycoon Konstantin Malofeyev warns that Putin will reject Trump’s peace offer unless it includes broader discussions on Russia's security concerns. He argues that for talks to be productive, they must address global order, not just Ukraine's future. Malofeyev also suggests that a U.S. rollback of support for Ukraine could lead to peace, but warns of the risk of nuclear escalation.https://www.ft.com/content/ac39b604-ef6d-41cb-bb8c-0eb76e002176FtVladimir Putin to reject Donald Trump’s opening peace offer, says Russian tycoonKonstantin Malofeyev says Russian president to engage in talks only if they include broader conflicts

Title: 🎬 The US is providing close air support to SDF forces near Deir ...
Description: The US is providing close air support to SDF forces near Deir Ez-zor with A-10 'Warthog' Thunderbolt II aircraft against SAA forces and Iranian proxies.Warthog go brrrrrrrrrt.

Title: 🎬 The 36th Marine Brigade along with other units repelled a larg...
Description: The 36th Marine Brigade along with other units repelled a large-scale mechanized Russian attack in the Kursk region. Russians used armoured vehicles, tanks and Chinese supplied DesertCross buggies.

Title: Le Monde reports that the US, Germany, and Hungary still oppose U...
Description: Le Monde reports that the US, Germany, and Hungary still oppose Ukraine's NATO membership, along with Slovakia, Belgium, Slovenia, and Spain. While France and the UK support Ukraine's accession, Biden rejects the idea, and Trump has 'never supported it,' even suggesting a 20-year delay for Ukraine's NATO membership.https://www.lemonde.fr/en/international/article/2024/12/03/zelensky-pleads-for-ukraine-nato-membership-europeans-look-for-another-solution_6735017_4.htmlLe Monde.frZelensky pleads for Ukraine NATO membership, Europeans look for another solutionAntonio Costa, the new president of the European Council, and Kaja Kallas, the new head of European diplomacy, visited Kyiv on Sunday, as soon as they took office. NATO foreign ministers are due to meet in Brussels on Tuesday and Wednesday.

Title: 🖼 Ukraine is requesting NATO countries to urgently provide at le...
Description: Ukraine is requesting NATO countries to urgently provide at least 20 air defense systems (Hawk, NASAMS, or IRIS-T) to counter Russian air attacks and prevent a blackout, says Foreign Minister Andrii Sybiha.

Title: 🎬 Foreign Minister Sybiha brought the 'Budapest Memorandum' to t...
Description: Foreign Minister Sybiha brought the 'Budapest Memorandum' to the NATO HQ, marking 30 years since its signing. 💬 'This document is a true reminder that long-term security decisions for Ukraine, like this one, are inappropriate and unacceptable. It failed to ensure transatlantic and Ukrainian security,' said the Ukrainian minister. Video is too big

Title: 🖼 More images of recently captured SAA equipment by rebel forces...
Description: More images of recently captured SAA equipment by rebel forces.

Title: 🖼 The SDF has taken control of the Khasham pocket, securing 7 vi...
Description: The SDF has taken control of the Khasham pocket, securing 7 villages near Deir Ez-Zor previously held by SAA forces. The Deir ez-Zor Military Council announced the deployment of forces to protect communities amid growing risks from ISIS activity.

Title: The rapid advance of Syrian rebel forces has led to the withdrawa...
Description: The rapid advance of Syrian rebel forces has led to the withdrawal of Russian ships from the Tartus port. On December 2, the auxiliary ship 'Yelnya' left the port, with reports of two frigates, another auxiliary vessel, and a submarine departing as well.https://www.navalnews.com/naval-news/2024/12/first-sign-russian-navy-evacuating-naval-vessels-from-tartus-syria/Naval NewsFirst Signs Russia Is Evacuating Navy Ships From SyriaThe Russian Navy's base at Tartus in Syria is crucial to its support of the Assad regime, and its ambitions on the world stage. The dramatic shift in the front lines in Syria now puts the base at risk. There are indications that Russia may be evacuating its…

Title: 🎬 Ukrainian forces have cleared Russian positions in the Novomly...
Description: Ukrainian forces have cleared Russian positions in the Novomlyns'k area in the Kharkiv region. In the last few days, news came in that Russian forces crossed the Oskil river and managed to grab a foothold. These gains now seem reversed after Ukraine reinforced the area.

Title: The US will send Ukraine 3 types of remote mining systems, includ...
Description: The US will send Ukraine 3 types of remote mining systems, including antipersonnel mines. These include 155mm 'ADAM' shells, portable 'MOPMS' mine-laying systems, and 'Volcano' systems. With Russia's 'meat' assaults, this could have significant impact.https://www.nytimes.com/2024/12/02/us/politics/ukraine-weapons-shipments.htmlNY TimesU.S. Sending $725 Million in Arms to Ukraine, Including More Land MinesThe package, the largest since April, comes amid deep concerns in Ukraine that the Trump administration may cut off aid. The president-elect has vowed to end the war quickly, but has not said how.

Title: 🖼 Rebel forces continue their advance north of Hama and took con...
Description: Rebel forces continue their advance north of Hama and took control over Marioud village. Also, rebels have reached Khattab northwest of Hama and reportedly seized an SAA ammo depot. This means the defense of the SAA west of Qomhana could already have been breached.

Title: 🎬 On the Kurakhove direction, Russia launched an armored column ...
Description: On the Kurakhove direction, Russia launched an armored column towards the positions of the 71st Brigade. Thanks to coordinated actions of artillery and UAVs, at least 4 vehicles were destroyed or incapacitated. Video is too big

Title: 🖼 Blyatmobile Revolution 3.0
Description: Blyatmobile Revolution 3.0

Title: 🎬 More reinforcements from the rebel forces (HTS-led) are headin...
Description: More reinforcements from the rebel forces (HTS-led) are heading through Khan Shaykhun towards the front near Hama.

Title: 🎬🖼 Rebel forces (HTS-led) came closer to Hama once again and ca...
Description: Rebel forces (HTS-led) came closer to Hama once again and captured Tal al-Nasiriyah. Previously (a bit more north), rebel forces captured Suran and seized armoured equipment such as tanks, previously belonging to Assad's army.

Title: 🇸🇪🇫🇮 A break in the internet cable between Sweden and Finland...
Description: 🇸🇪🇫🇮 A break in the internet cable between Sweden and Finland has occurred, reports Helsingin Sanomat. The cable was severed in two locations on land, significantly reducing internet capacity. Police are investigating the incident as a deliberate crime.https://www.hs.fi/suomi/art-2000010875402.htmlHelsingin SanomatSuomen ja Ruotsin välillä kaapeli­rikko, SVT: poliisi epäilee rikostaRuotsin ja Suomen välillä on kaapelikatkos, SVT kertoo.

Title: 🎬 Yesterday, SDF forces left their strongholds in the Sheikh Maq...
Description: Yesterday, SDF forces left their strongholds in the Sheikh Maqsoud neighbourhood in Aleppo after an agreement with rebel forces. Note the HMMWV armoured vehicles in the column which likely means they were able to keep their weapons and equipment under safe passage.

Title: 🎬 At dawn, the SDF's Deir ez-Zor Military Council launched its o...
Description: At dawn, the SDF's Deir ez-Zor Military Council launched its offensive against the SAA, advancing from the direction of Al-Husseiniyah, one of the seven villages north of Deir ez-Zor, and removing barriers around the area.The operation is called 'Battle of Return' and was announced yesterday.

Title: NATO Secretary General warns Trump of a 'grave threat' to the U.S...
Description: NATO Secretary General warns Trump of a 'grave threat' to the U.S. if Ukraine agrees to an unfavorable peace deal. The new NATO boss emphasized such a move would embolden adversaries like Russia and China, potentially escalating aggression against Taiwan. https://www.ft.com/content/8a80fa59-c658-4f83-b133-bb0364ce8913FtNato chief warns Donald Trump of ‘dire threat’ to US if Ukraine pushed into bad peace dealMark Rutte says risks to America will increase if China, Russia, Iran and North Korea are empowered

Title: 🖼 The Ukrainian Air Force reports that overnight, a total of 28 ...
Description: The Ukrainian Air Force reports that overnight, a total of 28 Shahed drones were launched of which 22 were shot down. One more Shahed drone was supressed by electronic warfare and 2 drones returned to Belarus. In Ternopil, there were several hits to critical infrastructure.

Title: NATO unlikely to grant Ukraine a membership invitation at Tuesday...
Description: NATO unlikely to grant Ukraine a membership invitation at Tuesday's meeting, diplomatic sources report. Ukraine's Foreign Minister Andrii Sybiha urged NATO to act, arguing an invitation would dismantle Russia's justification for its war.https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/nato-expected-sidestep-ukraines-call-quick-invite-2024-12-03/ReutersNATO expected to sidestep Ukraine's call for quick inviteNATO is highly unlikely to heed Ukraine's call for a membership invitation at a meeting on Tuesday, according to diplomats, dashing Kyiv's hopes of a political boost as it struggles on the battlefield and awaits Donald Trump's return to the White House.

Title: Ukraine rejects substitute guarantees for NATO membership. 'The o...
Description: Ukraine rejects substitute guarantees for NATO membership.'The only real security guarantee and deterrent is Ukraine's full NATO membership. We remember the Budapest Memorandum, we will not agree to any alternatives, substitutes, or surrogates.'https://www.eurointegration.com.ua/news/2024/12/3/7199750/Європейська правдаУкраїна офіційно відмовляється від гарантій, що є замінниками членства в НАТО – заява МЗСМіністерство закордонних справ України у день початку міністерської зустрічі НАТО оприлюднило офіційну позицію щодо можливих гарантій безпеки, які можуть розглядатися як інструмент стримування від агресії РФ.

Description: Northwest of Hama it seems like back and forth fighting. SAA sources now claim Assad loyalists were able to recapture some villages previously captured by rebel forces.

Description: East of Hama, there is action near the Raqqah-Homs highway. Heavy skirmishes are reported between rebel and SAA forces. Rebels already reached Rahajan and As Sa'an villages.

Title: 🎬 🇬🇪 Tensions escalate in Georgia: clashes again erupted betwe...
Description: 🇬🇪 Tensions escalate in Georgia: clashes again erupted between protesters and special forces as authorities mobilize reserves to bolster security services. Despite crackdowns, streets remain packed with demonstrators. Police are deploying tear gas heavily against the crowds.

Title: 🖼 President Zelensky signs a decree imposing new sanctions on Ru...
Description: President Zelensky signs a decree imposing new sanctions on Russia. The measures target over 100 entities involved in developing, producing, and supplying drones for the occupiers, as well as those aiding in importing critical components and training operators.'This is about cutting off key support for enemy drones,' Zelensky said.

Title: 🇺🇦 During Chancellor Olaf Scholz's visit to Ukraine, a new kami...
Description: 🇺🇦 During Chancellor Olaf Scholz's visit to Ukraine, a new kamikaze drone resembling a smaller version of the Iranian 'Shahed' was unveiled. Developed locally and in collaboration with German firms, it features an AI-driven homing system.https://mil.in.ua/uk/news/v-ukrayini-predstavyly-dron-shozhyj-na-zmenshenu-versiyu-shahed/#google_vignetteМілітарний. Чесні новини про армію, війну та оборону.В Україні представили дрон схожий на зменшену версію 'Shahed'В Україні публічно представили ударний дрон який ззовні схожий на зменшену версію іранського БПЛА 'Shahed'.

Title: 🎬 In occupied Tokmak, a drone strike targeted a gas station repo...
Description: In occupied Tokmak, a drone strike targeted a gas station reportedly used by Russian forces to refuel military equipment. Several tanks of gasoline and diesel fuel exploded.

Title: 🖼 Today at 5:30 & 7:30 PM, Russian Su-34/Su-57 aircraft launched...
Description: Today at 5:30 & 7:30 PM, Russian Su-34/Su-57 aircraft launched 3 Kh-59/69 missiles at Kryvyi Rih, Zaporizhia region. All 3 were intercepted by the Eastern Air Command’s air defense.

Title: 🎬 In addition to the already captured L-39 trainer aircraft, reb...
Description: In addition to the already captured L-39 trainer aircraft, rebel forces now captured 7 (!) MiG-23 fighter aircraft from the SAA at Al-Nayrab Airbase near Aleppo. Video is too big

Title: 🎬 🇺🇦🔥 Ukrainian forces from the 129th Territorial Defense Bri...
Description: 🇺🇦🔥 Ukrainian forces from the 129th Territorial Defense Brigade destroyed three Russian BTR-82AT near Plekhovo, Kursk region Video is too big

Title: 🎬 Chancellor Scholz visited Ukraine today. We had a long talk wi...
Description: Chancellor Scholz visited Ukraine today. We had a long talk with him - one of the longest bilateral meetings, a special format - more than two and a half hours. We discussed all the topics that are important for our countries. The main thing is air defense, strengthening our defense of the sky. Germany is already a leader in this and in support in Europe in general. On the continent, it is number one in terms of assistance to Ukraine: almost 30 billion euros from Germany. Defense support, as well as support for our resilience. I would like to thank the Chancellor personally and the whole of Germany, the entire German people, who are so fundamentally with us. It is important for us in Ukraine that the level of German support does not decrease in the future. This will be the most important and timely signal to all our other partners. At the meeting with the Chancellor, we agreed that Germany will continue to stand by Ukraine in the right way.

Title: 🖼 Meanwhile northwest of Hama, rebel forces are advancing west a...
Description: Meanwhile northwest of Hama, rebel forces are advancing west and captured four towns in the Al-Ghab plains: Bab al-Taqa, al-Tuwaina, al-Huwaiz and al-Sharia.

Title: 🖼 Rebel forces are again advancing towards Hama, capturing Tayba...
Description: Rebel forces are again advancing towards Hama, capturing Taybat al-Imam and Maardis. The SAA defensive line is said to be at Qomhana-Khattab.

Title: 🇺🇸 The U.S. is preparing a $725M military aid package for Ukrai...
Description: 🇺🇸 The U.S. is preparing a $725M military aid package for Ukraine, including counter-drone systems, HIMARS munitions, and anti-personnel landmines, AP reports.https://apnews.com/article/ukraine-russia-725-million-weapons-us-biden-38eaf70cad013d25cc7c505f7a3b6bcfAP NewsUS will send Ukraine $725 million more in counter-drone systems, anti-personnel land minesThe U.S. is preparing to send Ukraine an additional $725 million in military assistance. It includes counter-drone systems and munitions for its High Mobility Artillery Rocket System, which could indicate more of the longer range missiles are headed to the…

Title: 🖼 The SDF and Deir Ezzor Military Council have launched 'Operati...
Description: The SDF and Deir Ezzor Military Council have launched 'Operation Return' to reclaim seven villages—Husseiniyah, Salhiyah, Hatlah, Marrat, Mazloum, Khasham, and Tabiyah—controlled by Syrian SAA forces and Iranian militias, aiming to bring displaced residents back to their homes.

Title: 🖼 North of Hama, rebel forces have restarted offensive operation...
Description: North of Hama, rebel forces have restarted offensive operations again after a brief break. They report control over the villages of Suran, Al-Jalama, Al-Mughair, Al-Jabbin, Tal Malah and Al-Mabatan.

Title: 🎬 Destruction of a Russian Ural-4320 supply vehicle by an FPV dr...
Description: Destruction of a Russian Ural-4320 supply vehicle by an FPV drone. Its crew was later found and also hit.

Title: 🇺🇦 Ukraine’s MFA condemned Georgia’s crackdown on peaceful pro-...
Description: 🇺🇦 Ukraine’s MFA condemned Georgia’s crackdown on peaceful pro-EU protests and urged Tbilisi to stop scaring citizens with the 'Ukrainian scenario.''Respect citizens' right to peaceful protest,' calling out Georgia’s drift toward Moscow 🇬🇪https://www.eurointegration.com.ua/news/2024/12/2/7199699/Європейська правдаМЗС України закликало владу Грузії не лякати людей 'майданом', перетворюючи країну на БілорусьУ Міністерстві закордонних справ України знову засудили надмірне застосування сили до проєвропейських протестувальників у Грузії та дорікнули Тбілісі за спроби залякати громадян 'українським сценарієм', щоб стримати від протестів проти відкату демократії.

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov: Moscow is ready t...
Description: 🇷🇺 Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov: Moscow is ready to consider peace initiatives for Ukraine if driven by a sincere desire to establish peace. The statement came during his meeting with Hungary’s Péter Szijjártó in Moscow.

Title: 🎬 Kurdish civilians are leaving Tell Rifaat and Sheikh Maqsood n...
Description: Kurdish civilians are leaving Tell Rifaat and Sheikh Maqsood neighbourhood in Aleppo for Manbij and Raqqah. It is unclear if SDF/YPG fighters remained or if they are part of this convoy.

Title: 🎬 🇩🇪 Germany will provide Ukraine with a sixth IRIS-T system a...
Description: 🇩🇪 Germany will provide Ukraine with a sixth IRIS-T system and Sea King helicopters, Chancellor Scholz announced. In December, Ukraine will also receive Patriot launchers (new) and Gepard self-propelled anti-aircraft systems. 'Germany has delivered urgent winter aid to help repair critical damage,' Scholz added. Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸⚡️ Biden rushes billions in weapons to Ukraine amid fears ...
Description: 🇺🇸⚡️ Biden rushes billions in weapons to Ukraine amid fears Trump may cut aid after taking office.While some officials worry about U.S. stockpiles, others argue Kyiv needs more manpower to sustain the fight. Frustrations grow as Ukraine resists lowering its draft age from 25 to 18.

Title: 🖼 Destroyed Russian tank in the Kurakhove direction.
Description: Destroyed Russian tank in the Kurakhove direction.

Title: 🖼 Rebel forces claim that a total of 10 aircraft were seized at ...
Description: Rebel forces claim that a total of 10 aircraft were seized at Al-Nayrab Airport (Aleppo International). A former Libyan (Haftar forces) L-39 Albatros trainer aircraft was added today.

Title: 🖼 The northern countryside of Aleppo is now considered completel...
Description: The northern countryside of Aleppo is now considered completely rebel controlled. Previously SAA- and SDF-held territories have been captured. The rebel forces command room declared full control.

Title: 🖼 Rebel forces report control over Qasr Abu Samra, north east of...
Description: Rebel forces report control over Qasr Abu Samra, north east of Hama. This area was still considered SAA-held territory even after the initial rebel gains, so the area of rebel control seems to have expanded here.

Title: 🖼 🇺🇦🤝🇩🇪 'Drones, FPV systems, and advanced tech—key tools h...
Description: 🇺🇦🤝🇩🇪 'Drones, FPV systems, and advanced tech—key tools helping our defenders.' Today, alongside Chancellor Olaf Scholz, Zelensky reviewed smart drones co-produced by Ukraine and Germany and met with manufacturers.

Title: 🎬 Rebel forces secure more captured heavy equipment that came in...
Description: Rebel forces secure more captured heavy equipment that came into their hands after SAA's hasty departure.

Title: 🎬 SAA reinforcements started arriving more near the front lines ...
Description: SAA reinforcements started arriving more near the front lines in Hama.

Title: 🖼 🫂Six more children have been brought back to Ukraine from occ...
Description: 🫂Six more children have been brought back to Ukraine from occupied territories under the Bring Kids Back UA initiative. Among them: 16-year-old Vitaliy and 14-year-old Artem, whose family was held hostage. His mother was abducted, forcing him to flee while his father remains under occupation.

Title: 🎬 🇺🇦🇩🇪 German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is in Ukraine today for...
Description: 🇺🇦🇩🇪 German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is in Ukraine today for his first bilateral visit in over two years. 'Grateful for Germany's leadership in supporting Ukraine against Russian aggression. We began by visiting wounded soldiers in rehabilitation. Together, we strive for a just peace and Europe's security,' Zelensky stated. Video is too big

Title: 🇷🇺 The Kremlin is preparing officials for an end to the war wit...
Description: 🇷🇺 The Kremlin is preparing officials for an end to the war with Ukraine, shaping a 'victory narrative' for the Russian public. Regional authorities are tasked with managing war veterans' reintegration to prevent unrest or crime, reports Kommersant.https://www.kommersant.ru/doc/7344159КоммерсантъВице-губернаторов нацелили на большинствоИм разъяснили, чего от них ждут на выборах и в обычной жизни

Title: 🎬 Together with Chancellor Olaf Scholz, Zelensky honored the mem...
Description: Together with Chancellor Olaf Scholz, Zelensky honored the memory of all Ukrainian soldiers whose lives were taken by Russian aggression. Video is too big

Title: 🖼 Rebel forces captured a T-90A tank on top of the already known...
Description: Rebel forces captured a T-90A tank on top of the already known Strela-10, Pantsir-S1 and S-125 air defense systems.

Title: 🖼 Overnight, 31 Russian drones entered Belarus, reports monitori...
Description: Overnight, 31 Russian drones entered Belarus, reports monitoring group 'Hajun.' Some drones crossed the border multiple times. Six drones were reportedly lost over Belarusian and Russian territory.

Title: 🖼 Rebel forces have taken control over the village of Kurnaz, no...
Description: Rebel forces have taken control over the village of Kurnaz, northwest of Hama.

Title: 🖼 Russia reaffirmed its support for Syrian leader Bashar al-Assa...
Description: Russia reaffirmed its support for Syrian leader Bashar al-Assad, with the Russian presidency stating ongoing backing. Meanwhile, the Iranian Foreign Minister also confirms full support for Syria and its army.

Title: 🎬 FPV drone operators of the 'Forpost' brigade destroyed a Russi...
Description: FPV drone operators of the 'Forpost' brigade destroyed a Russian BMP in the Vovchansk direction.

Title: 🖼 Scholz and Zelensky honored the memory of Ukraine's fallen her...
Description: Scholz and Zelensky honored the memory of Ukraine's fallen heroes by laying flowers at the people's memorial.
